text: 3:16 Rom 15:4; 2 Timoti 2:21; 2 Pita 1:20-21E fo, Godɨn Duam uabɨ, Godɨn Akɨnafarimɨn aven itir akabagh amizɨ da otifi. Ezɨ akar kam a bar bizir aghuim, a guizɨn akamɨn en sure gamuava, nɨghnɨzir aghuiba puvatɨzir gumazamiziba akɨrava, en daroriba akɨrava, egha arazir Godɨn damazimɨn derazibar en sure gami.
